creator: jlaughto@cisco.com
text:
I would like to have the cleartool command 'ls'
I have read the docs about "More tasks can be easily added by deriving from the
ClearCase class", but I an not sure how to do that ?
Would I need to compile ant (I just use the rpm)

creator: riznob@hotmail.com
text:
You should probably take this topic to the ant-dev or ant-user list for 
discussion.

Created attachment 13511
Additional class for "cleartool ls" command and ClearCase.java upadated
